sub_title: Manager Operations Vimec | supply chain, operations & project management, vision & software
summary:
It is my aim to create a high-quality technical product or service that has a concrete added value for the world, in close cooperation with a professional team. I have wide experience with applied science, software development, system integration, project management and technical account management in an international setting. My contribution to converting a research department into a commercial company has been significant. Preferably I work as a technical project manager in a multidisciplinary environment with a focus on software engineering and product development.

My background in applied physics proved to be of value in other work areas as well, such as software development, image processing and machine learning. I am able to acquire quickly a profound understanding of a complex system, product or technique – high-level or in detail when necessary.  I combine these analytical and scientific capabilities with empathy and communication skills. Moreover I am both quality aware and results-driven: I have an eye for detail while keeping an overview of the big picture.

I am the bridge between the sales and engineering department by translating scientific content into added value for the customer, while keeping an eye on both business requirements and human aspects. I accomplish synergy in cooperation within a team and between parties. My deliverables are of high-quality, on-time and the result of team work. I follow and define quality procedures, but I can also be pragmatic when needed. Moreover I establish sustainable account relationships based on customer satisfaction.

organizations.name: Prime Vision
organizations.position: R&D Project Manager, Technical Account Manager, Project Manager

projects.title: Biometric voter registration - Tanzania
projects.description: Managed the GenKey scope of supply regarding the Tanzania voter registration towards the presidential elections in 2015. The end customer was the Tanzania National Electoral Commission. I was responsible for the delivery of the voter management system, voter deduplication applying  automated fingerprint matching and the export of voter lists per polling station. The project required an international cooperation between the Genkey divisions (Ghana, US, Eindhoven), partners from South-Africa and on-site support engineers.

contributors.headline: Manager Operations Vimec | supply chain, operations & project management, vision & software

projects.title: Several postal automation projects - PostNL
projects.description:
Project manager and technical consultant regarding several postal automation projects at PostNL:
- Delivery and integration of sortation software for rest mail (project manager)
- Claiming and revenue projection for parcels (project manager)
- Development and integration of sorting system for registered letters (project leader and technical consultant)
- Development and integration of sorting system for letters and flats (technical consultant)

contributors.headline: Manager Operations Vimec | supply chain, operations & project management, vision & software

projects.title: An Post System Lots - Irish Post
projects.description: Successful, on-time delivery of a multi-million system integration project for the Irish Post, heading a team of four project leaders during two years. This included subcontracting to an American company and cooperation with a Japanese machine supplier. My main tasks were project definition and planning, communication between the several stakeholders, progress monitoring and assisting acceptance testing. The high customer satisfaction resulted in a sustainable relationship and ongoing new business.

contributors.headline: Manager Operations Vimec | supply chain, operations & project management, vision & software

projects.title: Several projects regarding automatic address reading - worldwide
projects.description:
Delivery of OCR and address assignment software for automatic reading of handwritten and machine-printed addresses to an American partner for several end customers (Australia Post, Caledonian Post, Morocco Post). Managed a team of R&D engineers, software developers and testers to successful deliveries, on time and within budget. 

Leading a team of 13 engineers towards a challenging R&D delivery for USPS in a short period of three months and under high pressure of the customer Siemens, realising all acceptance criteria. My main contribution was setting clear intermediate goals in three software releases, monitoring the R&D progress carefully and reporting regularly to the customer. The project budget was about EUR 1 million.

Managed the development of new techniques and team skills in order to deploy software for recognition of Hebrew, for example by organisation of an internal language course and by the cooperation with an Israeli company. This resulted in a profitable delivery and a satisfied customer.

contributors.headline: Manager Operations Vimec | supply chain, operations & project management, vision & software

profile_positions.description: As operational manager, I am part of the Vimec management team and responsible for the operations. Vimec Applied Vision Technology is the leader in Glass Inspection and Monitoring Solutions for the world-wide industry of packaging glass. In this market, we are dedicated to designing, building and validating superior visual inspection systems. Since June 2021, Vimec is part of the Tiama Group.
profile_positions.title: Manager operations

profile_positions.description: As operational manager, I am responsible for the operational projects of the Vimec brand within Kind Technologies. Vimec Applied Vision Technology is the leader in Glass Inspection and Monitoring Solutions for the world-wide industry of packaging glass. In this market, we are dedicated to designing, building and validating superior visual inspection systems. I am part of the Core3-management team of Vimec, contributing to order intake, general management and realisation of net sales.
profile_positions.title: Manager Operations

profile_positions.description: I joined Beltech BV - under the umbrella of Kind Technologies - to be involved with really interesting technical content: machine vision. My role was versatile and multidisciplinary, as I was dealing with software/hardware/electrical engineering, machine vision, procurement, support, sales and of course project management. My main responsibility was the product development, support and assembly of smart cameras for automatic license plate recognition and related functionalities. Moreover, I was responsible for communications with the key customer.
profile_positions.title: System Engineer

profile_positions.description: Hired by VDL Enabling Transport Solutions (ETS), I have introduced the Scrum Agile methodology in order to enhance efficiency, planning and monitoring of software development projects in the automotive industry. I managed short-term software projects and support activities regarding e-mobility, i.e. electrical buses in public transport. Furthermore I contributed to the quality processes at VDL ETS.
profile_positions.title: Software Project Leader

profile_positions.description: As head of the Project Office of GenKey, a biometric solutions company targeting on emerging countries, I was responsible for the definition and improvement of the project process and administration at Genkey offices in Ghana and Eindhoven. From the back-office in Eindhoven, I have been supporting the on-site project manager with quality assurance, requirements engineering and procurement activities for example. Furthermore, I have been managing projects in the field of finger print matching and biometric ID in various African countries.
profile_positions.title: Head Project Office & Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project management of high-tech, international software development projects in the area of automated sorting of postal items in the logistics industry, with budget sizes of 100k up to a few million euro. Cooperation with several major companies, like Siemens, for several international end-users, e.g. USA, Israel, Morocco, Australia and Ireland. My successful project deliveries have led to high customer satisfaction and sustainable customer relationships.

Improving the project process has been a constant point of focus. I incorporated parts of the Prince2 standard to create a high quality level of the project process. The quality standard of the software development process was equal to CMMI level 2. Furthermore, I contributed to the ISO quality process of the project process and software process within Prime Vision, for example by setting up a process for issue and release management.

Technical account management was part of my role by supporting the sales team in the presales phase with proposals, activity an cost estimations, demonstrations and presentations.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Technical sales support, for example by means of demonstrations and presentations. Contribution to the pre-sales stage by writing proposals and performing activity and cost estimations for several international customers. I have built long lasting account relationships. 
 
I was part of several bidding teams acquiring contracts with Australia Post and Irish Post to mention the largest ones. For some proposals, I was in lead of the bidding team, e.g. several opportunities within PostNL. I managed independently the account relationship with an American partner, which resulted for example in gaining the business of Morocco Post.
profile_positions.title: Technical Account Manager

profile_positions.description: Project management of several innovative projects for PostNL regarding automatic recognition and video coding of addresses on postal items. I combined the role of project manager and lead R&D engineer and was author of several proposals resulting in new business.
profile_positions.title: R&D Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Development and improvement of pattern recognition and image processing techniques, for automatic recognition of both handwritten and machine printed text on forms and postal items. I fulfilled the role of lead engineer in several R&D projects for PostNL.
profile_positions.title: R&D Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description: Responsible for “team tennis”, i.e. competition, tournaments, youth tennis and training.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member Tennis Youth Committee & Communication Committee
volunteer_experiences.description:
Chairman youth committee since 2018. Organization of events for youth members of the tennis club such as tournaments. Responsible for the communication towards junior tennis players via website, email and social media.

Regarding the communication committee I am responsible for the introduction and maintenance of the IT platform (website, app, mailserver, etc).

Organization of yearly neighboughood events such as barbecues in order to maintain and improve the solidarity, communication and atmosphere within our neighbourhood. 

As a temporary member of financial control committee I have also checked the finances of the club.
